Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for the Azure Functions project, including expected workloads, triggers, and integrations with other Azure services.
Design the architecture for the Function App, including the selection of hosting plans (Consumption, Premium, or Dedicated), triggers, and bindings.

Tasks.Task: Set Up Azure Subscription and Resource Group
Tasks.Task Description: Ensure an Azure subscription is available and create a dedicated resource group for the Function App to organize resources.
Create the Function App in the Azure portal, CLI, or PowerShell, selecting the appropriate hosting plan and region.
Set up application settings, including connection strings, environment variables, and any required secrets using Azure Key Vault.
Enable security features such as Managed Identity, IP restrictions, and private endpoints. Configure Azure Key Vault for secure storage of secrets.
Write the function code using the appropriate programming language and deploy it to the Function App using tools like Visual Studio, VS Code, or Azure DevOps.
Configure monitoring using Azure Monitor and Application Insights. Set up alerts for function failures, performance issues, and resource utilization.
Perform functional and performance testing to ensure the Function App meets the project requirements and handles expected workloads.
Optimize the Function App for performance by adjusting settings such as timeout limits, scaling configurations, and memory allocation.
Document the Function App architecture, configurations, and operational procedures for future reference and team training.
Implement a Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipeline using Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions for automated deployments.
Perform a security audit to ensure compliance with organizational and regulatory standards. Address any identified vulnerabilities.
Set up backup and disaster recovery plans for the Function App, including enabling Azure Backup and configuring geo-redundancy.
Analyze the cost of running the Function App and optimize by adjusting hosting plans, scaling configurations, and resource usage.
